text: Agustín Díaz (born June 6, 1954 in Havana, Cuba), known as Augie Diaz, is an American sailor and world-class competitor in the Snipe, Star and Laser classes. He is the son of Gonzalo Diaz, who sailed for Cuba at the 1959 Pan American Games.Augie Diaz Sailing He began sailing Optimists at the age of eight in Clearwater, Florida. In 1973, he won the IYRU Single-handed dinghy World Youth title in the Laser class. After graduating from Christopher Columbus High School (Miami) in 1972, Diaz sailed for Tulane University, where he studied Mechanical engineering. He was All American on the Tulane Green Wave sailing team in 1973, 1974 y 1975, won the ICSA Coed Dinghy National Championship in 1973 and the ICSA Men's Singlehanded National Championship in 1974, leading the team to win the Leonard M. Fowle Trophy in 1974. That same year he was elected ICSA College Sailor of the Year. He received the US Sailor of the Year Award in 2003. He has been Snipe world champion in 2003 and 2005,Snipe World Championship and Star world champion in 2016.Augie Diaz and Bruno Prada Win Star Worlds In the Snipe class, he was also world masters champion in 2002, 2004, 2006 y 2012;Snipe World Master Championship Western Hemisphere & Orient champion in 1972 and 2002; North American champion in 1974, 2004, 2006, 2007, 2008 and 2013; and U.S. National champion in 1974, 1980, 2001, 2002, 2006, 2008, 2009, 2010, 2011 and 2018. He has won a silver medal in Snipe at the 1971 Pan American Games and a silver medal in the Snipe at the 2011 Pan American Games and a bronze medal at the 2015 Pan American Games.DIAZ Augie Toronto 2015 Athlete Profile ==Pan American Games== * Silver medal in Snipe at Colombia 1971. * Silver medal in Snipe at Guadalajara 2011. * Bronze medal in Snipe at Toronto 2015. ==References== ==External links== *Augie DIAZ (USA) World Sailing Category:1954 births Category:Living people Category:American male sailors (sport) Category:Pan American Games bronze medalists for the United States Category:Sailors at the 2011 Pan American Games Category:Sailors at the 2015 Pan American Games Category:Snipe class world champions Category:Star class world champions Category:Tulane University alumni Category:Tulane Green Wave sailors Category:ICSA College Sailor of the Year Category:US Sailor of the Year Category:Cuban emigrants to the United States Category:Pan American Games silver medalists for the United States Category:Pan American Games medalists in sailing Category:World champions in sailing for the United States of America
